headline: Is McKesson (MCK) an Overlooked Dividend Stock in the Pharma Sector for 2025?
summary: McKesson Corporation (NYSE:MCK) is included among the 14 Best Pharma Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2025. In its fourth-quarter 2025 earnings announcement, the company revealed plans to spin off its Medical-Surgical Solutions segment into a separate entity, referred to as “NewCo.” Management emphasized that disciplined portfolio management remains a core element of its overall strategy. […]
